description: This Good Dog product is a must-have for all pet owners! It is designed to provide your pup with a range of beneficial vitamins and minerals to help keep them healthy and active. This product contains essential fatty acids, antioxidants, vitamins and minerals, and is enriched with natural ingredients like salmon oil, coconut oil, and flaxseed oil. It is also free from fillers, grains, gluten, and artificial preservatives, making it ideal for pups with sensitive stomachs. With regular use, your pup will have a shiny coat, improved digestion, and increased energy levels. Give your pup the best with Good Dog!
